These six new YA novels are brimming with magical worlds, fierce heroes, and epic quests, perfect for anyone who craves adventure and a dash of the supernatural. From dark fates to unlikely allies, these stories deliver the thrill and depth that fans of Geralt’s journey know and love. Get ready to dive into enchanting tales that will transport you to realms both wondrous and treacherous. Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade by Evan J. Corbin Release Date: October 28 2024 Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade weaves together elements of medieval fantasy, LGBTQ romance, and science fiction, as Asher uncovers long-buried secrets that could change the future forever. Will his earnest plans save the kingdom, or will it unleash a fate darker than he ever imagined? Buy on Amazon Court of Dragons and Twilight (The Dragon Crown Series Book 5) by G. Kohanek Release Date: October 29 2024 Something evil and cunning drives this bloodthirsty horde. This twisted villain is unlike any other, and the threat it presents is more daunting than anything ever imagined. Should it continue unchecked, all life will be consumed and the souls of its victims will be lost forever. Can the first wizard and his band of heroes stand against the might of a god from another realm? Homes are burning, war starting, people murdered, all in Will’s name and he can’t stand aside any longer. html:
31 Oct 2024

6 New Young Adult Novels for Fans of The Witcher

Calling all fans of The Witcher! These six new YA novels are brimming with magical worlds, fierce heroes, and epic quests, perfect for anyone who craves adventure and a dash of the supernatural. From dark fates to unlikely allies, these stories deliver the thrill and depth that fans of Geralt’s journey know and love. Get ready to dive into enchanting tales that will transport you to realms both wondrous and treacherous.

Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade

by Evan J. Corbin

Release Date: October 28 2024

Asher and the Prince: The Apex Blade weaves together elements of medieval fantasy, LGBTQ romance, and science fiction, as Asher uncovers long-buried secrets that could change the future forever. Will his earnest plans save the kingdom, or will it unleash a fate darker than he ever imagined?

Buy on Amazon

Court of Dragons and Twilight (The Dragon Crown Series Book 5)

by G. Bailey

Release Date: October 30 2024

After the surprise attack, Emrys is lost, and it’s not only him trapped in the Air Court. I am offered one more trial, and the winner takes the world. This time, I won’t be the only one facing Aphrodite’s trials.

Buy on Amazon

The Dark Lord’s Design (Dawn of Wizards Book 3)

by Jeffrey L. Kohanek

Release Date: October 29 2024

Something evil and cunning drives this bloodthirsty horde. This twisted villain is unlike any other, and the threat it presents is more daunting than anything ever imagined. Should it continue unchecked, all life will be consumed and the souls of its victims will be lost forever. Can the first wizard and his band of heroes stand against the might of a god from another realm?

Buy on Amazon

Creatures of Chaos

by Julie Hall

Release Date: October 29 2024

As a creature without magic, I’d be a fool to enter Chaos, but the prize—a dagger of untold power—could change my powerless existence. With that dagger, I could wield magic, earn respect, and maybe, just maybe, win the heart of the dragon heir… it’s a risk I have to take.

Buy on Amazon

Blood of the Crown (William of Alamore Series Book 6)

by C. J. R. Isely

Release Date: October 29 2024

His hope was to first become a knight but it seems that King Tollien, the tyrant of Thornten, is already moving to ensure Will can never lay claim to his lands. Homes are burning, war starting, people murdered, all in Will’s name and he can’t stand aside any longer.

Buy on Amazon

Don’t Let the Forest In

by CG Drews

Release Date: October 29 2024

As alluring as it is unsettling, award-winning author CG Drews’ debut YA psychological horror will leave readers breathless and hesitant to venture deeper into the woods.

Buy on Amazon
